Name: Impact
Description: Apply effects on impact with an enemy.

Name: Intersection
Description: Apply continuous effects to enemies in range.

Name: Draining
Description: Apply continuous effects to enemies in range while spell is being drained.

Name: Cast
Description: Apply effects once on cast.

Name: Depletion
Description: Apply effects once when spell dissipates.

Name: Follow
Description: Follow the target.

Name: Orbit
Description: Orbit the target.

Name: Directional
Description: Propel towards the direction of the cast.

Name: Guided
Description: Steer the spell. Effectiveness improves with level.

Name: Hover
Description: Move towards a single point and hover.

Name: Forward
Description: Look towards the direction of movement.

Name: Spin
Description: Rotate clockwise at a constant rate.

Name: Counterspin
Description: Rotate counterclockwise at a constant rate.

Name: Caster
Description: Face the caster.

Name: Aim
Description: Face the aim direction (mouse).

Name: Track
Description: Face the target.

Name: Narrow
Description: Narrow arc to 45 degrees.

Name: Spread
Description: Increase arc by 30 degrees per level.

Name: Reach
Description: Increase min radius by 1 tile per level.

Name: Depth
Description: Increase max radius by 1 tile per level.

Name: Expand
Description: Increase size over time by 1 tile per level per second.

Name: Shrink
Description: Decrease size over time by 1 tile per level per second.

Name: Radiate
Description: Particles radiate outwards.

Name: Gravitate
Description: Particles radiate inwards.

Name: Barrier
Description: Drain the energy of intersecting magic based on density.

Name: Collision
Description: Spell energy depletes after any collision.

Name: Weight
Description: Push any colliding enemies (apply knockback based on Speed).

Name: Charge
Description: Increase starting energy by 2 per level. Energy depletes at a rate of 1 per second.

Name: Absorb
Description: Drain a numerical value on the target(s) to fill the caster’s.

Name: Drain
Description: Reduce a numerical value on the target(s).

Name: Fill
Description: Increase a numerical value on the target(s).

Name: Randomize
Description: Randomize the selected value on the target (relative to original value)

Name: Mark
Description: Mark the selected targets for the next spell cast.

Name: Health
Description: Select target’s HP.

Name: Mana
Description: Select target’s mana.

Name: Max Health
Description: Select target’s Max Health.

Name: Max Mana
Description: Select target’s Max Mana.

Name: Latitude
Description: Select target’s X coordinate.

Name: Longtitude
Description: Select target’s Y coordinate.

Name: Torque
Description: Increase rotation speed per level.

Name: Speed
Description: Increase movement speed per level.

Name: Density
Description: Increase magic absorption
